name: Alert Popup
author: Karthik Viswanathan
description: A small popup, with a message, action buttons, and optional title, that requires user input to dismiss.

attributes.location: Sets the location (top, bottom, or center) of the alert

events.show: Triggered when the alert is shown.
events.hide: Triggered when the alert is hidden. Event object contains a buttonType property that holds which button was pressed (primary or secondary).

methods.show: Shows this alert and waits for user input.
methods.hide: Hides this alert given what type of button (primary or secondary) was pressed.

getters.location: Gets the location (top, bottom, or center) of the alert

setters.primaryText: Sets the primary button's text in the primary-text attribute
setters.secondaryText: Sets the secondary button's text in the secondary-text attribute
setters.location: Sets the location (top, bottom, or center) of the alert in the location attribute
